html: 24,000 Rohingya Muslims killed. 40,000 have bullet wounds. 17,718 have been raped. 34,000 thrown into a fire. 114,000 have been beaten. It's not enough to condemn Myanmar's generals. They've promised to exterminate all survivors. My latest here:https://medium.com/@cjwerleman/its-not-enough-to-condemn-myanmar-s-generals-something-urgent-must-be-done-to-save-rohingya-50abdb0efc13 …
text:
24,000 Rohingya Muslims killed.
40,000 have bullet wounds.
17,718 have been raped.
34,000 thrown into a fire.
114,000 have been beaten.

It's not enough to condemn Myanmar's generals. They've promised to exterminate all survivors.

My latest here:https://medium.com/@cjwerleman/its-not-enough-to-condemn-myanmar-s-generals-something-urgent-must-be-done-to-save-rohingya-50abdb0efc13 …

html: Believe FIFA have a similar view. Truth is 90%+ of handballs that are punished are not deliberate. I’ve argued for a long time that it would be less ambiguous to make all handballs, deliberate or otherwise fouls...at least everyone would know where they stand..not on their hands.https://twitter.com/paddybarclay/status/1033688828811329536 …
text: Believe FIFA have a similar view. Truth is 90%+ of handballs that are punished are not deliberate. I’ve argued for a long time that it would be less ambiguous to make all handballs, deliberate or otherwise fouls...at least everyone would know where they stand..not on their hands.https://twitter.com/paddybarclay/status/1033688828811329536 …

html: You possibly could make a case under the current Laws that it’s not technically handball. However the PL don’t want goals being scored by hand so their guidelines in cases like this are always to rule handball.https://twitter.com/paddybarclay/status/1033685991830315008 …
text: You possibly could make a case under the current Laws that it’s not technically handball. However the PL don’t want goals being scored by hand so their guidelines in cases like this are always to rule handball.https://twitter.com/paddybarclay/status/1033685991830315008 …

html: We speak to a member of PGMOL (Professional Games Match Officials Ltd) after the games, at length, every week before our show to discuss any controversial refereeing decisions that day. Yesterday they said that their guidelines concluded it was handball. So I doubt they cringe.https://twitter.com/paddybarclay/status/1033660085136961536 …
text: We speak to a member of PGMOL (Professional Games Match Officials Ltd) after the games, at length, every week before our show to discuss any controversial refereeing decisions that day. html: This is just plain wrong. How could you pull a trigger and shoot something as majestic as this animal. Trophy hunting should be banned worldwide. RT if you AGREE that there should be a GLOBAL ban on #trophyhunting NOW!pic.twitter.com/lcDK19vZ4M
text:
This is just plain wrong. How could you pull a trigger and shoot something as majestic as this animal. Trophy hunting should be banned worldwide. 

RT if you AGREE that there should be a GLOBAL ban on #trophyhunting NOW!pic.twitter.com/lcDK19vZ4M

html: Please, if you want Hillsborough families to gain justice don't comment on the outcome of today's Bettison case. I know it's hard but lawyers are watching and will use any comments that could influence a jury as a reason to get future trials shut down. This is really important.
text: Please, if you want Hillsborough families to gain justice don't comment on the outcome of today's Bettison case. I know it's hard but lawyers are watching and will use any comments that could influence a jury as a reason to get future trials shut down. This is really important.
